title.rendered: What Do I Need To Sell My Car To A Junkyard?

content.rendered:
If you are ready to get cash for junk cars in Chicago, contact Aero Auto Parts today. We are ready to walk you through what you need in order to sell your car to a junkyard or, specifically, us.

What To Know

When you decide to sell your junk car to a junkyard, it’s important to get as much for the vehicle as you possibly can. You can sell your car to a junkyard for them to be able to use it for car or truck parts.

What You Need

In order to get a junk car off your hands, you will need the following:

  • An original car title
  • Personal and driver’s license information

Contact Aero Auto Parts and we will buy your junk car from you, no matter the condition it’s in. Our mechanics can inspect the vehicle, extracting the good parts that will ultimately be offered for sale at discounted rates.

Before You Sell

Once you have decided to get rid of your junk car, make sure you do a car inspection of your own. Meaning, you should remove all your personal belongings from the vehicle and keep any accessories that you want before you bring your car to us.

After You Sell

Once Aero Auto Parts has your car, wait around a week and then contact the state’s Department of Motor Vehicles to make sure that the title has been transferred. We look forward to giving you cash for junk cars in Chicago, so don’t wait another day. Contact Aero Auto Parts today and we will get you settled.
